properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_ID , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_ADMIN ORDER BY ADMIN_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TB_ADMIN ( ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PWD ) VALUES ( SEQ_ADMINNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = ?
